src_original: viṃśatir ime maitreyānuśaṃsā nirāmiṣadāne /  yo lābhasatkāram apratikāṅkṣan dharmadānaṃ dadāmi /
smṛtimāṃś ca bhavati matimāṃś ca bhavati buddhimāṃś ca bhavati gatimāṃś ca bhavati dhṛtimāṃś ca bhavati prajñāvāṃś ca bhavati /
devāś cāsyaujaḥ kāye praks.ipanti /  amitrāś cāsyāvatāraṃ na labhante /  mitrāṇi cāsyābhedyāni bhavanti /  ādeyavacanaś ca bhavati /
